p: Within 4 weeks of administration of hESC-derived RPE cells, subretinal hyperpigmentation developed within the area of injection of the cell suspension in all 12 participants ( Fig 1). The mean area of subretinal hyperpigmentation increased progressively, at a rate that seemed to be dose dependent during the first 3 months, and subsequently slowed ( Fig S1, available at www.aaojournal.org). A subsequent modest reduction in area of subretinal hyperpigmentation was evident in 2 participants (patients 4 and 9). The mean area of subretinal pigmentation at 12 months was correlated directly with the dose of hESC-derived RPE cells administered ( R 2 = 0.981; Fig S2, available at www.aaojournal.org).
